data.name: vSpatial
data.description:
Your workspace is now available from ANYWHERE on Meta Quest Pro & Quest

Connect to your PC and get virtual monitors for each application window. Pair your Bluetooth mouse & keyboard to your headset for longer more productive & precision work. See your teams presence in our new TeamSpace and collaborate organically just like at the office.

Free Workspace includes:
- Safe & secure remote connect for Windows 10
- Virtual monitors for each remote application window
- Pair Bluetooth mouse & keyboard to headset
- Pass time with basketball
- 1:1 Collaboration with Avatars, spatialized audio, & screen sharing
- 2D collaboration with our virtual webcam & mic

Enhance your experience with Workspace Pro bundle subscription for $9.99/month (cancel at anytime) which includes all of the below:
- Remote Desktop Enhanced: Access to your PC from anywhere
- TeamSpace: Host your team in VR with up to 16 participants

changelog.change_log:
* Added tracked keyboard support for Logitech K830 and Apple Magic keyboard
* Added keyboard type Passthrough, to see into your environment to use any mouse/keyboard
* Virtual mic/webcam premium feature is now enabled for free
* Monitors and apps resume streaming much faster now when changing Windows resolution settings (still takes a little while though)
* Added settings to enable/disable remote mouse/keyboard control
* Remote desktop now listens for holding the Shift/Ctrl/Alt keys for Insert, End, Home, PageUp, PageDown, and arrow keys
* App streaming initial resolution set to max
* Added enter focus mode button to carousel controls
* Screens are now launched at a consistent size in focus mode
* Environment updates
* Users are now notified when they're in focus mode, and its purpose
* Monitor DPI scaling now only occurs when experimental streaming apps setting is enabled, override to stop changing DPI scaling in all cases
* Updated tutorial content
* Improved z-fighting
* Fixed a bug that could cause the carousel toggle to not do anything
* Fixed a bug that could cause the controller models to stay visible when they should be hidden
* Keyboard bug fixes
* Many minor bug fixes
* Many minor optimizations
